OP09-001.name: Shanks OP09-001
OP09-001.effect: [Once Per Turn] This effect can be activated when your opponent attacks. Give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −1000 power during this turn.

OP09-002.name: Uta OP09-002
OP09-002.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Red-Haired Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP09-003.name: Shachi & Penguin OP09-003
OP09-003.effect: [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

OP09-004.name: Shanks OP09-004
OP09-004.effect: Give all of your opponent's Characters −1000 power. [Rush]

OP09-005.name: Silvers Rayleigh OP09-005
OP09-005.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] If your opponent has 2 or more Characters with a base power of 5000 or more, draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

OP09-007.name: Heat OP09-007
OP09-007.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] Up to 1 of your Leader with 4000 power or less gains +1000 power during this turn.

OP09-008.name: Building Snake OP09-008
OP09-008.effect: [Activate: Main] You may place this Character at the bottom of the owner's deck: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn.

OP09-009.effect: [On Play] Trash up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less.

OP09-012.effect: If your Character [Bonk Punch] would be K.O.'d by an effect, you may trash this Character instead.

OP09-014.name: Limejuice OP09-014
OP09-014.effect: [On Play] Your opponent cannot activate up to 1 [Blocker] Character that has 4000 power or less during this turn.

OP09-017.effect: [DON!! x1] If your Leader has 7000 power or more and the {Kid Pirates} type, this Character gains [Rush].

OP09-019.effect: [Main] If your Leader has the {Red-Haired Pirates} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 5000 or more power, draw 1 card. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.

OP09-020.name: Come On!! We'll Fight You!! OP09-020
OP09-020.effect: [Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Red-Haired Pirates} type card other than [Come On!! We'll Fight You!!] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.

OP09-021.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Stage: If your Leader has the {Red-Haired Pirates} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1000 power during this turn.

OP09-022.effect: Your Character cards are played rested. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it, and play up to 1 {ODYSSEY} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

OP09-023.name: Adio OP09-023
OP09-023.effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {ODYSSEY} type, set up to 3 of your DON!! cards as active. [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle.

[Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

OP09-061.effect: [DON!! x1] All of your Characters gain +1 cost. [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When 2 or more DON!! cards on your field are returned to your DON!! deck, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active, and add up to 1 additional DON!! card and rest it.
